Class BoundedPool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core.BoundedPool<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the pooled object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pool<T>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BoundedPool<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pool<T>
    A bounded object pool.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.06.
